Descriptor.Title: Cannot apply indexing with [] to an expression of type '{typeName}'
Descriptor.Message: Cannot apply indexing with [] to an expression of type '{typeName}'

Descriptor.Title: Operator cannot be applied to operand of specific type
Descriptor.Message: Operator '{operatorToken}' cannot be applied to operand of type '{operandType}'

Descriptor.Title: Operator cannot be applied to operanda of specific typea
Descriptor.Message: Operator '{operatorToken}' cannot be applied to operands of type '{operandType1}' and '{operandType2}'

Descriptor.Title: This value is not mutable
Descriptor.Message: This value is not mutable

Descriptor.Title: Invalid invocation
Descriptor.Message: Invalid invocation expression.

Descriptor.Title: Pipe target must be invocable
Descriptor.Message: The pipe operator requires an invocation or settable property access on the right-hand side

Descriptor.Title: The name does not exist in the current context
Descriptor.Message: The name '{name}' does not exist in the current context

Descriptor.Title: Member already defined
Descriptor.Message: Type '{typeName}' already defines a member called '{memberName}' with the same parameter types

Descriptor.Title: Function already defined
Descriptor.Message: A function named '{name}' is already defined with the same parameter types

Descriptor.Title: Member does not contain definition
Descriptor.Message: '{container}' does not contain a definition for '{member}'

Descriptor.Title: Namespace used like a type
Descriptor.Message: '{name}' is a namespace but is used like a type

Descriptor.Title: Variable used like a type
Descriptor.Message: '{name}' is a variable but is used like a type

Descriptor.Title: Call is ambiguous
Descriptor.Message: The call is ambiguous between the following methods or properties: '{method1}' and '{method2}'

Descriptor.Title: The left-hand side of an assignment must be a variable, property or indexer
Descriptor.Message: The left-hand side of an assignment must be a variable, property or indexer

Descriptor.Title: Cannot deconstruct non-tuple type
Descriptor.Message: Cannot deconstruct type '{typeName}' because it is not a tuple type

Descriptor.Title: Deconstruction element count mismatch
Descriptor.Message: Deconstruction pattern expects {expectedCount} element(s) but the right-hand side contains {actualCount}

Descriptor.Title: Method name expected
Descriptor.Message: Method name expected

Descriptor.Title: Use of unassigned local variable
Descriptor.Message: Use of unassigned local variable '{name}'

Descriptor.Title: Local variable must be initialized
Descriptor.Message: Local variable '{name}' must be initialized

Descriptor.Title: Variable already defined
Descriptor.Message: A variable named '{name}' is already defined in this scope

Descriptor.Title: Variable shadows outer scope variable
Descriptor.Message: Variable '{name}' shadows a variable declared in an outer scope

Descriptor.Title: Const local requires a constant initializer
Descriptor.Message: Const local '{name}' must be initialized with a compile-time constant

Descriptor.Title: Const local initializer cannot be converted
Descriptor.Message: The initializer for const local '{name}' cannot be converted to '{typeName}'

Descriptor.Title: Const field requires a constant initializer
Descriptor.Message: Const field '{name}' must be initialized with a compile-time constant

Descriptor.Title: Const field initializer cannot be converted
Descriptor.Message: The initializer for const field '{name}' cannot be converted to '{typeName}'

Descriptor.Title: Const field requires an initializer
Descriptor.Message: Const field '{name}' must have an initializer

Descriptor.Title: A readonly field cannot be assigned to (except in a constructor or a variable initializer)
Descriptor.Message: A readonly field cannot be assigned to (except in a constructor or a variable initializer)

Descriptor.Title: Property or indexer '{name}' cannot be assigned to -- it is read only
Descriptor.Message: Property or indexer '{name}' cannot be assigned to -- it is read only

Descriptor.Title: Await requires async context
Descriptor.Message: The 'await' operator can only be used within an async method or function

Descriptor.Title: Expression is not awaitable
Descriptor.Message: The type '{typeName}' is not awaitable

Descriptor.Title: Awaiter is missing IsCompleted
Descriptor.Message: The awaiter type '{awaiterType}' must have an accessible instance property 'IsCompleted' returning 'bool'

Descriptor.Title: Awaiter is missing GetResult
Descriptor.Message: The awaiter type '{awaiterType}' must have an accessible parameterless 'GetResult' method

Descriptor.Title: Async return type must be Task-like
Descriptor.Message: Async return type '{returnType}' is not supported; async functions must return System.Threading.Tasks.Task or System.Threading.Tasks.Task<T>

Descriptor.Title: Async Task return cannot include a value
Descriptor.Message: Since '{methodName}' is an async method that returns 'Task', a return keyword must not be followed by an object expression

Descriptor.Title: Type or namespace does not exist in namespace
Descriptor.Message: The type or namespace name '{typeOrNs}' does not exist in the namespace '{container}'

Descriptor.Title: Type expected without wildcard
Descriptor.Message: Type is expected without wildcard

Descriptor.Title: Unassigned out parameter
Descriptor.Message: Use of unassigned out parameter '{parameterName}'

Descriptor.Title: Type requires type arguments
Descriptor.Message: The type '{name}' requires {arity} type argument(s)

Descriptor.Title: Cannot inherit from sealed type
Descriptor.Message: Type '{typeName}' is sealed and cannot be inherited

Descriptor.Title: No virtual member to override
Descriptor.Message: No virtual member named '{memberName}' was found in the base type to override

Descriptor.Title: Virtual member in sealed type
Descriptor.Message: Member '{memberName}' cannot be virtual because the containing type '{typeName}' is sealed

Descriptor.Title: 'sealed' modifier requires override
Descriptor.Message: Member '{memberName}' cannot be marked 'sealed' because it is not an override

Descriptor.Title: Cannot override sealed member
Descriptor.Message: Member '{memberName}' cannot override sealed member '{overriddenMemberName}'

Descriptor.Title: Static members cannot be virtual or override
Descriptor.Message: Static member '{memberName}' cannot be marked '{modifier}'

Descriptor.Title: Type already defined
Descriptor.Message: A type named '{name}' is already defined in this scope

Descriptor.Title: 'partial' modifier missing
Descriptor.Message: Type '{name}' has multiple declarations; all declarations must include the 'partial' modifier

Descriptor.Title: Static constructors cannot specify a base initializer
Descriptor.Message: Static constructors cannot specify a base constructor initializer

Descriptor.Title: Explicit interface specifier must name an interface
Descriptor.Message: Explicit interface specifier must name an interface type

Descriptor.Title: Optional parameters must be trailing
Descriptor.Message: Optional parameter '{parameterName}' must be the last parameter in the list

Descriptor.Title: Default value must be a compile-time constant
Descriptor.Message: Default value for parameter '{parameterName}' must be a compile-time constant

Descriptor.Title: Default value cannot convert to parameter type
Descriptor.Message: Default value for parameter '{parameterName}' cannot be converted to '{parameterType}'

Descriptor.Title: Type does not implement interface
Descriptor.Message: Type '{typeName}' does not implement interface '{interfaceName}'

Descriptor.Title: Explicit interface member not found
Descriptor.Message: Interface '{interfaceName}' does not contain a member named '{memberName}' matching this signature

Descriptor.Title: Type argument does not satisfy constraint
Descriptor.Message: The type '{typeArgument}' must satisfy the '{constraint}' constraint for type parameter '{typeParameter}' of '{genericName}'

Descriptor.Title: Nullable type not allowed in union
Descriptor.Message: Nullable types are not allowed in union types

Descriptor.Title: Type name does not exist in type
Descriptor.Message: The type name '{name}' does not exist in the type '{container}'

Descriptor.Title: Symbol is inaccessible
Descriptor.Message: The {symbolKind} '{name}' is inaccessible due to its protection level

Descriptor.Title: Attribute not valid for target
Descriptor.Message: Attribute '{attributeName}' is not valid on target '{targetName}'. Valid targets are '{validTargets}'

Descriptor.Title: Attribute does not allow multiple
Descriptor.Message: Attribute '{attributeName}' cannot be applied multiple times to the same '{targetName}'

Descriptor.Title: Cannot assign void to an implicitly-typed variable
Descriptor.Message: Cannot assign void to an implicitly-typed variable

Descriptor.Title: Expression expected
Descriptor.Message: Expression expected

Descriptor.Title: Identifier expected
Descriptor.Message: Identifier expected

Descriptor.Title: Semicolon expected
Descriptor.Message: ';' expected

Descriptor.Title: Character expected
Descriptor.Message: '{character}' expected

Descriptor.Title: Duplicate modifier
Descriptor.Message: Duplicate '{modifier}' modifier

Descriptor.Title: Import directive out of order
Descriptor.Message: Import directives must appear before alias directives and member declarations

Descriptor.Title: Alias directive out of order
Descriptor.Message: Alias directives must appear before member declarations

Descriptor.Title: Field declaration requires a binding keyword
Descriptor.Message: Field declarations must start with 'let', 'var', or 'const'

Descriptor.Title: Unrecognized escape sequence
Descriptor.Message: Unrecognized escape sequence

Descriptor.Title: Newline in constant
Descriptor.Message: Newline in constant

Descriptor.Title: File-scope code out of order
Descriptor.Message: File-scope code must appear before any declarations

Descriptor.Title: File-scope code requires console application
Descriptor.Message: Only console applications may contain file-scope code

Descriptor.Title: File-scope code may only appear in one file
Descriptor.Message: File-scope code may only appear in one file

Descriptor.Title: Console application requires entry point
Descriptor.Message: Program.Main entry point not found

Descriptor.Title: Program has more than one entry point defined
Descriptor.Message: Program has more than one entry point defined

Descriptor.Title: try statement requires catch or finally
Descriptor.Message: A try statement must include at least one catch clause or a finally clause

Descriptor.Title: Catch type must derive from System.Exception
Descriptor.Message: Type '{typeName}' is not derived from System.Exception

Descriptor.Title: Thrown expression must be an exception type
Descriptor.Message: Expression of type '{typeName}' cannot be thrown because it does not derive from System.Exception

Descriptor.Title: File-scoped namespace out of order
Descriptor.Message: File-scoped namespace declarations must appear before any other members

Descriptor.Title: No overload for method taking argument
Descriptor.Message: No overload for method '{method}' takes {count} arguments

Descriptor.Title: Cannot convert from type to type
Descriptor.Message: Cannot convert from '{fromType}' to '{toType}'

Descriptor.Title: Cannot assign to type
Descriptor.Message: Cannot assign {fromType} to {toType}

Descriptor.Title: Invalid expression term
Descriptor.Message: Invalid expression term '{tokenText}'

Descriptor.Title: Return statement not allowed here
Descriptor.Message: Return statements are not valid in expressions; use an implicit return instead

Descriptor.Title: If expression requires an else clause
Descriptor.Message: If expressions used as values must include an else clause

Descriptor.Title: Break statement not allowed here
Descriptor.Message: Break statements are not valid in expressions; use a statement block instead

Descriptor.Title: Continue statement not allowed here
Descriptor.Message: Continue statements are not valid in expressions; use a statement block instead

Descriptor.Title: Goto statement not allowed here
Descriptor.Message: Goto statements are not valid in expressions; use a statement block instead

Descriptor.Title: Label not allowed here
Descriptor.Message: Labels are not valid in expressions; use a statement block instead

Descriptor.Title: Throw statement not allowed here
Descriptor.Message: Throw statements are not valid in expressions; use a statement block instead

Descriptor.Title: Nested try expression
Descriptor.Message: Nested try expressions are not allowed

Descriptor.Title: Non-invocable member
Descriptor.Message: Non-invocable member '{memberName}' cannot be used like a method

Descriptor.Title: Numeric literal out of range
Descriptor.Message: The numeric literal is out of range for its target type

Descriptor.Title: Unterminated character literal
Descriptor.Message: Unterminated character literal

Descriptor.Title: Invalid escape sequence
Descriptor.Message: Invalid escape sequence in character literal

Descriptor.Title: Target-typed member access requires a known type
Descriptor.Message: Cannot resolve member '.{memberName}' without a known target type
Descriptor.Description: Target-typed member access (like '.Test') requires a type context to resolve the member.

Descriptor.Title: Invalid alias target
Descriptor.Message: Invalid alias target. Supported targets are types, namespaces, unions, tuples, and predefined types like bool, char, int, long, float, double, string, and unit.

Descriptor.Title: Invalid import target
Descriptor.Message: Invalid import target. Only namespaces and types can be imported

Descriptor.Title: Spread source must be enumerable
Descriptor.Message: Cannot spread expression of type '{typeName}' because it is not enumerable

Descriptor.Title: Match expression is not exhaustive
Descriptor.Message: Match expression is not exhaustive; missing case for '{missingType}'

Descriptor.Title: Match arm is unreachable
Descriptor.Message: Match expression arm is unreachable because a previous arm matches all cases

Descriptor.Title: Match arm pattern is not valid
Descriptor.Message: Pattern {patternType} is not valid for scrutinee of type '{scrutineeType}'

Descriptor.Title: Match catch-all is redundant
Descriptor.Message: Match expression catch-all is redundant; all cases are already handled

Descriptor.Title: Lambda parameter type cannot be inferred
Descriptor.Message: Cannot infer the type of parameter '{parameterName}'. Specify an explicit type or use the lambda in a delegate-typed context

Descriptor.Title: Method group requires delegate type
Descriptor.Message: Method group '{methodName}' cannot be used as a value without a delegate type. Specify a delegate annotation or use the method in a target-typed context

Descriptor.Title: Method group conversion is ambiguous
Descriptor.Message: Method group '{methodName}' is ambiguous in this context. Specify a delegate type to disambiguate the target overload

Descriptor.Title: No overload matches delegate
Descriptor.Message: No overload for method '{methodName}' matches delegate type '{delegateType}'

Descriptor.Title: Label already defined
Descriptor.Message: A label named '{name}' is already defined in this scope

Descriptor.Title: Label not found
Descriptor.Message: The label '{name}' does not exist in the current context

Descriptor.Title: Reserved word cannot be used as a label
Descriptor.Message: The identifier '{name}' is a reserved word and cannot be used as a label

Descriptor.Title: Break statement not within loop
Descriptor.Message: Break statements are only valid inside loops

Descriptor.Title: Continue statement not within loop
Descriptor.Message: Continue statements are only valid inside loops
